definition: Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]

pinyin: Ya4 zhou1 Kai1 fa1 Yin2 hang2
Ya4 zhou1 Zu2 qiu2 Lian2 he2 hui4

definition: Asia/abbr. to 亞洲|亚洲[Ya4 zhou1]

pinyin: Ya4 zhou1 Tai4 ping2 yang2 di4 qu1

definition: (bird species of China) Asian desert warbler (Sylvia nana)
pinyin: Ya4 zhou1 mo4 di4 lin2 ying1

definition: (bird species of China) Asian short-toed lark (Alaudala cheleensis)
pinyin: Ya4 zhou1 duan3 zhi3 bai3 ling2

definition: (bird species of China) Asian paradise flycatcher (Terpsiphone paradisi)/also called 壽帶|寿带[shou4 dai4]

pinyin: Ya4 zhou1 yu3 Tai4 ping2 yang2
Ya4 zhou1 yu3 Tai4 ping2 yang2 di4 qu1
Bo2 ao2 Ya4 zhou1 Lun4 tan2
Zi4 you2 Ya4 zhou1 Dian4 tai2

sentences.english: Moreover, the skull has features resembling those of contemporary Asians.
sentences.chinese: 此外，该头骨具备类似现代亚洲人头骨的特征。

sentences.english: Shen Cheng is a project official with the animal-protection group ACTAsia.
sentences.chinese: 沈成，动物保护组织“行动亚洲”项目官员。

sentences.english: Here, the Asia Water Project summarises the arguments.
sentences.chinese: 以下是亚洲水资源项目对该论题的概述。

sentences.english: The South China Sea is a marginal sea of Eastern Asia.
sentences.chinese: 南海是亚洲东部的一个边缘海。

sentences.english: I lived in Asia for a few years.
We'd like to have them from Africa and Asia as well.
sentences.chinese: “我们也希望有来自非洲和亚洲的小孩”。

sentences.english: Is Japan Planning to Create an Anti-China"Asian NATO"?
sentences.chinese: 日本打算建立一个反中国的“亚洲北约”吗？

sentences.english: I love their Asian desserts, particularly the hot tofu with sweet ginger sauce.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢他们的亚洲甜点，特别是甜姜汁热豆腐。

sentences.english: It helped anchor Asia as the future of economic and technological advancement.
sentences.chinese: 它帮助掌握亚洲未来的经济和科技进步的方向。

sentences.english: The economic development that the bank helped spur has unleashed a wave of environmental woes.
sentences.chinese: 亚银协助亚洲经济快速发展，引爆一波环保灾难。

sentences.english: All races have their pluses and their minuses and asian people are just the same.
sentences.chinese: 所有种族都有自己的缺点和优点，亚洲人也是如此。

sentences.english: I still heard them even in Asian dens and German gutters.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然听见了他们甚而在亚洲穴和德国天沟。

sentences.english: HKUST also has one of the best business schools in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 香港科大同时拥有其中一所亚洲最棒的商学院。

sentences.english: Most Asians also speak English and Swahili .
sentences.chinese: 大多数亚洲人也讲英语和斯瓦希里语。

sentences.english: Prior to GSR, Sonny was the co-founder of Asia Wireless Technology Corp.
sentences.chinese: 创立金沙江基金以前，伍伸俊是亚洲无线科技创始人。

sentences.english: The top city in Asia is Singapore, at no. 26.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡作为亚洲最佳城市，排名26。

definition: Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
South Korea (Republic of Korea)/Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄[zhan4 guo2 qi1 xiong2]/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897
